column1: '''''An Interview with J.R.R.T.''''' is a [[Index:Audio recordings of J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: recorded interview]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] by [[Denys Gueroult]] in January [[1965]].

column1: The title 'An Interview with J.R.R.T.' comes from a transcription of the interview published in [[Minas Tirith Evening-Star (Volume 8, Number 2)
column2: ''Minas Tirith Evening-Star'' (Volume 8, Number 2)]]. The interview was first broadcast in January [[1971]] as part of the BBC Radio 4 book review programme ''Now Read On''.
